title: Would you support gene editing in wild animals to prevent disease?
author: Frances Klemm
bullets: Tell Us Scientists in Nantucket are trying to release genetically engineered mice in order to prevent Lyme disease.

title: Tom Brady dismissed ‘paranoid and distrustful’ accusations over Raiders conflict of interest
author: Hayden Bird
bullets: Morning Sports Update "With all the success it has given me, I feel I have a moral and ethical duty to the sport; which is why the point where my roles in it intersect is not actually a point of conflict, despite what the paranoid and distrustful might believe.

title: ‘A very disturbed mind’: Fairhaven man sentenced for assaulting girls with wife, including his daughter
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Crime Shayne Medeiros raped his daughter and other underage victims, sometimes with his wife present and participating, prosecutors said.

A Fairhaven man was sentenced to 26 years in prison Monday after pleading guilty to a slew of charges including child rape.

title: Boston police: Naked man carrying ‘large knife’ shot by officers after Beacon Hill break-in
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Crime The early morning incident happened on Mount Vernon Street, where the upscale restaurant 1928 Beacon Hill is located.
The scene on Mount Vernon Street Wednesday morning.

Truman Dickerson for The Boston Globe By Abby Patkin September 24, 2025 | 9:38 AM 1 minute to read A naked man allegedly wielding a large knife was shot by Boston police officers responding to a reported break-in in Beacon Hill Wednesday, authorities confirmed.

title: John Cena pops up again at Newburyport restaurant
